item.title: About
item.description: 陳彥勝, SAM, YanSheng Senior Architect at inwinSTACK familiar with OpenStack, little Ceph and K8S contact: sam012822@gmail.com Since hackpad already shutdown forever, and I still need a place for my blog. github.io should be great for this, so here I am:)
